list.name: Event ID
list.desc: Unused.

list.name: Entity ID
list.desc: Identifies the Event in event scripts.

list.name: Attached Part Name
list.desc: The part that the treasure is attached to.

list.name: Item Lot ID
list.desc: The item lot to be given.

list.name: Action Button ID
list.desc: If not -1, uses an entry from ActionButtonParam for the pickup prompt.

list.name: Pickup Anim ID
list.desc: Animation to play when taking this treasure.

list.name: Is in Chest
list.desc: Changes the text of the pickup prompt.

list.name: Starts Disabled
list.desc: Whether the treasure should be hidden by default.

list.name: Maximum Generated Count
list.desc: The maximum number of enemies that this generator can generate in total.

list.name: Generator Type
list.desc: The spawn location behavior to use upon a generation interval.

list.name: Maximum Spawn Count
list.desc: The maximum number of enemies that this generator can generate upon a generation interval.

list.name: Random Spawn Count: Minimum
list.desc: The minimum number to use when determining the amount of enemies to generate within a generation interval.

list.name: Random Spawn Count: Maximum
list.desc: The maximum number to use when determining the amount of enemies to generate within a generation interval.

list.name: Generation Interval: Minimum
list.desc: The minimum time interval (in seconds) between each generation interval.

list.name: Generation Interval: Maximum
list.desc: The maximum time interval (in seconds) between each generation interval.

list.name: Initial Spawn Count
list.desc: The initial number of enemies to spawn upon initialization of the generator.

list.name: Spawn Region Names
list.desc: Regions where parts will spawn from.

list.name: Spawn Part Names
list.desc: Parts that will be respawned.

list.name: ObjAct Part Name
list.desc: The part to be interacted with.

list.name: ObjAct ID
list.desc: A row in ObjActParam.

list.name: Host Entity ID
list.desc: The NPC whose world you're entering.

list.name: Event Flag ID
list.desc: Set when inside the event's region, unset when outside it.

list.name: Activation Goods ID
list.desc: ID of a goods item that is used to trigger the event.

list.name: UnkT0C
list.desc: Unknown; possibly a sound ID.

list.name: UnkT10
list.desc: Unknown; possibly a map event ID.

list.name: UnkT14
list.desc: Unknown; possibly flags.

list.name: Platoon Script ID
list.desc: The platoon script to apply when activated.

list.name: Group Part Names
list.desc: The parts that belong to this platoon.

list.name: Patrol Type
list.desc: Determines patrol behavior. 0 = return to first region on loop, 1 = go through list backwards on loop, etc.

list.name: Walk Region Names
list.desc: The regions that belong to this patrol.

list.name: Rider Part Name
list.desc: The rider Part that may ride the mount Part.

list.name: Mount Part Name
list.desc: The mount Part.

list.name: Sign Part Name
list.desc: The Part that the signpool is associated with.

list.name: Sign Puddle Param ID
list.desc: The ID of the SignPuddleParam row to use for this signpool.

list.name: Retry Part Name
list.desc: The Part that is associated with this retry point.

list.name: Event Flag ID
list.desc: Flag that must be set for retry point to be available.

list.name: Retry Region Name
list.desc: The Region that this retry point covers.
